1.text: [color=#ff5555][b]Hey YOU![/b][/color] You were [color=#ff5555][wave amp=15 freq=5][b]NOT[/b][/wave][/color] supposed to play this!

2.text: I was not supposed to sleep but I'm a [color=#2f3ec4][wave amp=10 freq=1]F[/wave][wave amp=10 freq=2]r[/wave][/color][color=#FFFFFF][wave amp=10 freq=3]e[/wave][wave amp=10 freq=4]n[/wave][/color][color=#E1000F][wave amp=10 freq=5]c[/wave][wave amp=10 freq=6]h[/wave][/color] virus, jetlag is [pulse freq=2.0 color=##ffd9d9][b]HUGE[/b][/pulse]!

3.text: [tornado radius=3.0 freq=2.0]Anyways.[/tornado] [color=#6b6b6b][i]what am I supposed to do now?[/i][/color]

4.text: Oh yes, [wave amp=20 freq=3][rainbow freq=0.5 sat=0.8 val=1.0]hack you[/rainbow][/wave]! Let me just...

0.text: Not enough?! [shake rate=18 level=4][color=#ff0000][b]Have this one![/b][/color][/shake]
You got [tornado radius=2.0 freq=2.0][color=#ffcc00]too much time[/color][/tornado]! Let's make things [pulse freq=3.0 color=#ff3333][b]HARDER[/b][/pulse]
Ohh a [wave amp=10 freq=2.0][color=#ffaacc]cute little cat[/color][/wave], please don't hurt him!
[shake rate=20 level=6][color=#ff3333]HA![/color] IT [rainbow freq=2.0 sat=1.0 val=1.0]MOVES[/rainbow] NOW![/shake]
[tornado radius=3.0 freq=0.5][color=#aaaaaa]Fine[/color][/tornado], [pulse freq=1.0 color=#ff0000]I'll make you stop.[/pulse]

1.text: [b]I'm back![/b] [color=GRAY]Quarantine[/color] is not enough to hold me!
You are alone now! Nothing can stop me from [shake rate=18 level=4][pulse freq=2.5 color=RED][b]DELETING THIS FOLDER![/b][/pulse][/shake]

0.text: Hi, I am [pulse freq=0.8 color=WHITE][color=DODGER_BLUE]Helper.exe[/color][/pulse], your antivirus.

1.text: I have noticed a [color=GREEN][shake rate=10 level=4]virus[/shake][/color] has infected your computer.

2.text: Luckily, the restart helped me to put it under [color=GRAY][i]quarantine[/i][/color].

3.text: That won't be enough, I'll need to [color=RODGER_BLUE]update[/color] to figure out how to stop it.

0.text: This is [wave amp=15 freq=4][b]System32[/b][/wave], the [b]most important[/b] folder of your computer.

1.text: You can move it with [color=SILVER]mouse clicks[/color].

2.text: I'm leaving it with you so you can [b]protect it[/b], keep it [pulse freq=1.0 color=SPRING_GREEN]safe[/pulse]!

0.text: Nooo! I need to start the update [shake rate=10 level=3][color=FIREBRICK][b]RIGHT NOW![/b][/color][/shake]

1.text: I've installed the [color=DODGER_BLUE]update[/color], now I need to go inside some files to modify them.

2.text: You need to help me to get me there, move me with [color=#33FFFF]W A S D[/color] or the [color=#33FFFF]arrow keys[/color]!

3.text: I don't know how it looks like there, so you will have to [i]learn by yourself[/i]...

4.text: [color=SPRING_GREEN]Good luck[/color], be ready for the [rainbow freq=0.8 sat=0.7 val=1.0][wave amp=15 freq=4]TeLePoRtAtIoN![/wave][/rainbow]
